Articles.Content:
What else can I say, I love the main theme, and I decided, hey, why not make my own version of it! And so I did. It may not be a 10/10 star rated song but I think it came out pretty well.

[https://soundcloud.com/sirderps101/my-custom-ksp-theme-1](https://soundcloud.com/sirderps101/my-custom-ksp-theme-1)
